scripts.build:local: expo prebuild && expo run:ios --configuration Release && expo run:android --variant release
scripts.test:e2e: expo start --clear & sleep 10 && cd ../../tests/mobile && detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug && detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug; cd ../../apps/mobile && pkill -f 'expo/bin/cli start'
scripts.test:e2e:headless: expo start --clear & sleep 10 && cd ../../tests/mobile && detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug && detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --headless; cd ../../apps/mobile && pkill -f 'expo/bin/cli start'
scripts.test:e2e:headless:nobuild: expo start --clear & sleep 10 && cd ../../tests/mobile && detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --headless; cd ../../apps/mobile && pkill -f 'expo/bin/cli start'
scripts.test:e2e:android: cd ../../tests/mobile && detox build --configuration android.emu.debug && detox test --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.test:e2e:android:headless: cd ../../tests/mobile && detox build --configuration android.emu.debug && detox test --configuration android.emu.debug --headless
